title: conditionalPanels not working properly
body:
Need to update conditionalPanels to properly display relevant elements of ui in both server-process.R and ui-process.R

`sidebarLayout(
           fluidRow(column(6,
                           radioButtons("choosePath",
                                       "Choose a model",
                                       choices = c("Generate new model",
                                                    "Use existing model"),
                                       selected = "Use existing model"
                                      )
           )),`

title: Add default values in Shiny Generate
body: It would be convenient to have default values in Shiny Generate tab for the "Upload file with processed chromatin data" and " Select models to train" fields. These could be "joined_scores_percentile_full_dataset.txt" and "glmStepAIC", respectively.

title: Problem with custom libraries
body:
When using custom libraries folder, the package foreach is installed fine but when running generate.R using Shiny the following error occurs:
```
Package ‘foreach’ version 1.4.4 cannot be unloaded:
 Error in unloadNamespace(package) : namespace ‘foreach’ is imported by ‘caret’ so cannot be unloaded
```
